line_1: Of Eggs unhatch'd, or callow Young bereav'd,
line_2: In ruthful Cries has told how much She griev'd.

line_1: "By a false Guardian of our wealth bereav'd —
line_2: "His Sister I; an orphan'd pair, we griev'd

line_1: Scarce tasting Life, He was of Joy bereav'd:
line_2: One Day, I think, in Paradise He liv'd;
